forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of morning fog with some patchy drizzle. Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 23C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 72F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with scattered thunderstorms arriving overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early then scattered thunderstorms developing late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms. High 16C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. Storms more numerous in the morning. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 16C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
